introduction to hr policies: Our HR policies foster a positive work environment, covering workplace conduct, anti-harassment, and working hours.
company values and culture: Our company thrives on integrity, teamwork, and innovation, promoting open communication and respect.
leave policy: Employees have 24 annual leave days. Sick leave requires a medical certificate.
payroll and benefits: Salaries are processed monthly. Benefits include health insurance and retirement plans.
performance review: Annual performance reviews based on KPIs and goal achievements drive professional growth.
